interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pinkiou Air Cushions BB Cream CC Cream Mushroomhead Foundation Moisturizing Concealer Hyaluronic Acid Molecule Deep Moisturizing Brightens the Complexion and Lasts for a Ｌong Ｔime（Ivory） Review Date: 2021/10/22 Store: Pinkiou Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pinkiou', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 2.99 x 2.91 inches; 4.87 Ounces'} Review Text: Looking at the design of the case this is in, it looks like the smaller part of the top should open. If it is suppose to open, I can't figure it out. So, I just unscrewed the entire top off to use it. Not really a big issue.
The foundation itself is waterproof. Does last all day with no problem.
It's a nice smooth foundation. Easy to apply with the sponge that comes with this.
It does cover up some of the skin flaws.
It's an okay foundation for a decent price. Kept my skin soft all day.
Was easy enough to wash off at the end of the day. I would buy again. Review Title: How to open? Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pantene Pro-V Damage Detox Rebuilding Conditioner 24 fl oz Pantene {'Brand': 'Pantene', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4 x 2.8 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '080878177301', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'} It does make my hair soft but, I can't take the minty smell it has! I use Pantene products all the time and was shocked when I was in the shower and put this conditioner on my head. I stopped and looked at the bottle to see what exactly I was using. Doesn't smell nice like the other Pantene Conditioners I've used. Going to have to put this bottle under my cabinet to use only when I'm desperate. Will go back to the other Pantene conditioners. And I will always open and smell any new shampoo or conditioner I buy. Don't like minty smell. LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} Fantastic facial cleaning brush. I like that it has a pretty case to use if I ever travel with it. You can store the other brushes (comes with 3. One for massage, one for sensitive skin and one normal brush)
Great that the battery holds a charge for about 30 uses. Nice feature for when I'm on the road and don't want to bother with the charger at every hotel.
Has 3 speeds so you can decide on how much brushing you want on your face.
My face feels so clean after I'm done using it. I put on some night cream, with the massage brush, afterwards and my face is so smooth. I love it.
I'm also wondering how difficult it will be to find replacement brush heads. Quick and easy facial cleaning in no time Tweezers for Eyebrows, MORGLES 5PCS Tweezers for Women Precision Tweezers Set with Eyebrow Brush Leather Case for Eyebrow Ingrown Hair Removal MORGLES {'Package Dimensions': '6.73 x 4.06 x 0.75 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018807', 'Manufacturer': 'MORGLES'} It's so hard to find good tweezers that actually grab the hair. These tweezers seem to work nicely.
I tried 3 of them so far and I have no complaints.
The case is nice to keep them all organized and easy to find. The eyebrow brush was a nice addition to this set.
The curved scissors work great also.
Glad to have this set in my collection. Will make it so much easier when I need to do a bit of face grooming. Nice variety CAXIRO IPL Hair Removal Device for Women and Man, Permanent Reduction in Hair Regrowth for Body, Face & Precision Areas (Bikini and Underarms) CAXIRO {'Package Dimensions': '7.76 x 7.68 x 2.32 inches; 1.48 Pounds', 'UPC': '791324774318'} I'll say it, I hate shaving. The older I get the more hair I get on my upper lip. Horrible.
So I am now trying this laser tool to see if it'll help with at least most of my unwanted hair.
I haven't been using it long. I clean and then I shave the areas that I want to laser treat.
I would say that after about 3 weeks/3 times a week, you'll see at least a little difference if not a big difference.
The device is easy to hold in one hand.
Says that it will last my lifetime. And it probably will. The most I'll be using it is the first month or two. After that I expect only maintenance use.
No counter to count down the number of used flashes. But it's okay. Not a big deal.
It does have to be plugged in. Again, not an issue. I only have it out, while using it, for about 10 mins tops. Takes me 2 seconds to plug it in.
Love having this. Anything that makes a day go a bit easier is okay with me. Nice Laser Removal Tool Anghie Complete Kit for Beginners Anghie {'Brand': 'Anghie', 'Size': 'Green-shader&liner', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 4.65 x 3.58 inches; 1.54 Pounds', 'UPC': '770240204666', 'Manufacturer': 'Anghie'} After using different tattoo machines, this one is more just for beginners.
It's light and easy to use. Kit comes with almost everything needed to start practicing.
I wanted to see how good this machine would do with lines. It's okay but, the machine does get a bit on the warm side after having it run for about 60-90 mins.
All in all this kit is nice. Nice machine ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts ZZLOVE {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} I don't like the pump of this wash. It's so small that it takes so many pumps to get a small amount. I finally gave up and just poured it out of the bottle.
Scent....Not the greatest. It doesn't last long which is nice because it's not a scent I want to smell like when I get out of the shower.
Did lather nice. Rinsed off and I felt clean.
Maybe men would like this better than women. And some may like how it smells. Just not a scent for me. It's just okay Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Cuckoo ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} I like the size of this. It's nice and small so it's easy to keep in my purse for when I need it.
Easy to use. Just roll on my face and it absorbs any oils without messing up my makeup.
Does come with a second ball.
Not sure how long the one ball will last since I just started using it. Seems that it would last quite a long time. Nice and compact Pinkiou Air Cushions BB Cream CC Cream Mushroomhead Foundation Moisturizing Concealer Hyaluronic Acid Molecule Deep Moisturizing Brightens the Complexion and Lasts for a Ｌong Ｔime（Ivory） Pinkiou {'Brand': 'Pinkiou', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 2.99 x 2.91 inches; 4.87 Ounces'} Looking at the design of the case this is in, it looks like the smaller part of the top should open. If it is suppose to open, I can't figure it out. So, I just unscrewed the entire top off to use it. Not really a big issue.
The foundation itself is waterproof. Does last all day with no problem.
It's a nice smooth foundation. Easy to apply with the sponge that comes with this.
It does cover up some of the skin flaws.
It's an okay foundation for a decent price. Kept my skin soft all day.
Was easy enough to wash off at the end of the day. I would buy again. How to open?
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Maintains a strong preference for Pantene products, showcasing consistent loyalty in hair care while exploring new brands in skincare.
- **Hair Care Needs:** Focuses on products that target damaged and frizzy hair, favoring restorative solutions.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Highly sensitive to scents; prefers pleasant fragrances and reacts negatively to minty smells.
- **Product Evaluation:** Assesses hair and skincare products based on sensory experience, particularly scent, alongside functionality (softness of hair) and usability of tools.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Recently purchased a foundation that contains hyaluronic acid, indicating an interest in products that provide moisture and a long-lasting finish. The user is open to exploring new products, especially those that align with personal care needs.
- **Review Patterns:** Engages with products through detailed reviews, articulating both pros and cons. The latest feedback emphasized ease of use, performance in maintaining skin softness, and overall value for money.
  
This updated summary highlights a user who prioritizes effectiveness, sensory comfort, and practicality in their grooming routine. They continue to adapt to body and facial care, showing a willingness to integrate new products that meet their specific preferences, particularly regarding usability and sensory experience. The user is keen on ensuring that the products they choose enhance their overall skincare regimen.
